A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I had read some of the criticisms of the movie before seeing it\, I went in with an open mind and unfortunately\, I felt the critics were right. There’s a lot of cool stuff in the movie\, some great parts\, and nostalgia\, but the storylines were waaaaay too much. The movie was too long\, too complicated\, too busy\, and just didn’t live up the the admittedly high expectations I had for it.
